divs: Sighting DetailsI was leaving my house for work at approximately 12:15 am I never turned any outside lights on as I did not like people to see I was leaving. It was a dark night clear no moon. I stepped onto my back deck closed the door and all of a sudden it got darker. I naturaly looked up and directly over my house coming from front to back where I was on the deck was a huge craft. It was not that high in the sky all black no sound whatsoever. It looked like a huge flying wing. I stood there as it flew at a very slow speed in a direct straight line to the east until it was out of sight. Being near NY and also near a small airport we have many planes flying over all the time. This was not high enough was enormus and made no sound and no lights. I just wanted to see if anyone else reported this at that time.
Summary: Huge black Craft no sound no lights flying straight and slow and very low to ground
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Branford
There were no other sightings in Branford on or around November 15th 1995
